00026 //This function ought to be called after loadConfig but before initialize
00027 void GPS::initConfig( mrpt::utils::CConfigFileBase & config, const std::string & sectionName) {
00028 
00029         this->vendor = config.read_string(sectionName, "GPS_TYPE", "Novatel" );
00030         this->isGpggaUsed = config.read_bool(sectionName,"use_gga", true);
00031         this->isGprmcUsed = config.read_bool(sectionName,"use_rmc", false);
00032         this->baudRate = config.read_int(sectionName,"baudRate", 57600);
00033         this->portName = config.read_string(sectionName,"COM_port_LIN","/dev/ttyS0");
00034         this->processRate = config.read_int(sectionName,"process_rate", 1);
00035 
00036 }
00037 
00038 void GPS::initialize() {
00039         // check if connection is already established, if not, reconnect
00040         if (this->isGPS_connected()) {return; }
00041         cout << "Connecting to GPS ... (./YClopsLib/GPS)" << endl;
00042         CSerialPort myCom(this->portName);
00043         myCom.setConfig(this->baudRate,0,8,1,false);
00044         cout << "Post open" << endl;
00045 
00046         stringstream inputStream;
00047         if( this->isGpggaUsed ) {
00048                 cout << "Using gpgga" << endl;
00049                 if( "PocketMAX" == this->vendor )
00050                         inputStream << "$jasc,gpgga," << this->processRate << "\n\r";
00051                 else if( "Novatel" == this->vendor )
00052                         inputStream << "log gpgga ontime " << this->processRate << "\n\r";
00053                 else
00054                         cerr << "Unsupported vendor" << endl;
00055                 myCom.Write(inputStream.str().c_str(),inputStream.str().length());//this will tell the gps to get a satellite reading once a second
00056         }
00057 
00058         if( this->isGprmcUsed ) {
00059                 cout << "Using gprmc" << endl;
00060                 if( "PocketMAX" == this->vendor) {
00061                         inputStream << "$jasc,gprmc," << this->processRate << "\n\r";
00062                 }
00063                 else if( "Novatel" == this->vendor ) {
00064                         inputStream << "log gprmc ontime " << this->processRate << "\n\r";
00065                 }
00066                 else
00067                         cerr << "Unsupported vendor" << endl;
00068                 myCom.Write(inputStream.str().c_str(),inputStream.str().length());//this will tell the gps to run the nmea rmc command once a second
00069         }
00070 
00071         myCom.close();
00072 }

00074 void GPS::dumpData(std::ostream & out ) {
00075         out << "************" << endl;
00076         out << "GPS" << endl;
00077         out << "Connection: " << this->isGPS_connected() << " " << "Signal: " << this->isGPS_signalAcquired();
00078 
00079         static bool isValid = false;
00080         static CObservationGPSPtr gpsData;
00081         CGenericSensor::TListObservations                               lstObs;
00082         //prime the pump with the first gps observation
00083 
00084         this->getObservations(lstObs);
00085         out << " Size: " << lstObs.size() << endl;
00086         if(lstObs.size()) {
00087                 isValid = true;
00088                 gpsData = CObservationGPSPtr(lstObs.begin()->second);
00089                 //this->appendObservation(gpsData);//This probably wont be used
00090         }
00091         if(isValid) {
00092                 if( gpsData->has_GGA_datum ) {
00093                         out << "GGA: " << gpsData->GGA_datum.latitude_degrees << ", " << gpsData->GGA_datum.longitude_degrees << endl;
00094                 }
00095 
00096                 if( gpsData->has_RMC_datum ) {
00097                         out << "RMC: " << gpsData->RMC_datum.latitude_degrees << ", " << gpsData->RMC_datum.longitude_degrees << endl;
00098                 }
00099         }
00100         out << "************" << endl;
00101 
00102 }
